name: Contagion ( )
description:
You open your Computer and wouldn't you know it but a contagious virus has started messing about and corrupting all your data. You boot up your programs and get ready to clean up some code! Move Contaminated Data Blocks (white) onto the Delete Zones (circles with X) to clear each of the 20 levels... but be careful, the Contagion(  ) is watching you... 

  • 20 puzzling levels mixing classic Sokoban gameplay with a few added challenges...
  • Beat your Highscore by aiming to get 0 Reboots and 0 Deaths.
  • Around 30 minutes of gameplay

If you liked Contagion(  ) leave a comment!
